structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Home Inspection License Applicants Licensed In Another State
law.text: Upon payment to the board of a fee and the submission of a written application provided by said board, the board shall issue a home inspector license to a person who holds a valid license or registration issued by another jurisdiction which has standards substantially equivalent to or exceeding the standards of the commonwealth, as determined by said board.
